name: My Beauty Lounge
description:
How do you feel when you come out of the hairdresser - relaxed, beautified?
Now you have the power to make women feel beautiful!

Blow, cut, dye, and earn money!
Expand this great business even further!

Discover new hairstyles that will change the fashion, double your customers!

How will you run your business like a boss with gorgeous hair?
publishers: PB BILISIM TEKNOLOJI YAZILIM SAGLIK HIZMETLERI VE DANISMANLIK LIMITED SIRKETI
